tripleplay.util

Class Input.LayerRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • tripleplay.util.Input.Region
      • tripleplay.util.Input.LayerRegion
  • Enclosing class:
    Input<L>

    public static class Input.LayerRegion
extends Input.Region
    A region that encompasses supplied bounds, as transformed by the supplied layer's transform. While the layer in question is not visible, the region will match clicks. If a reaction using this region is considered for processing and its layer has been removed from the view hierarchy, it will automatically be canceled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LayerRegion(Layer layer, pythagoras.f.IRectangle bounds) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canTrigger()
      Returns true if this region can be triggered, false if it's currently invisible.
      boolean hasExpired()
      Returns true if this region is no longer relevant and should be removed.
      boolean hitTest(pythagoras.f.IPoint p)
      Returns true if the (screen-coordinates) point triggers falls in this region.
